entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
